bibl.title: Among the Rocks: A First Look at Medieval Duweishat, from the Archive.
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: Archaeological evidence allows to observe a gradual agricultural colonisation of the site of Duweishat during the first millenium AD as well as the penetration of christianity into this isolated rural area. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: David N. Edwards, Among the Rocks: A First Look at Medieval Duweishat, from the Archive.
A. Łajtar, A. Obłuski & I. Zych (edd.), Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 359-380, 13 figg.

Archaeological evidence allows to observe a gradual agricultural colonisation of the site of Duweishat during the first millenium AD as well as the penetration of christianity into this isolated rural area. - Avec résumé en anglais.
